org.apache.hadoop.hbase.thrift

Class TestThriftHttpServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.thrift.TestThriftHttpServer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestThrift2HttpServer, TestThriftSpnegoHttpFallbackServer, TestThriftSpnegoHttpServer

    public class TestThriftHttpServer
extends Object
    Start the HBase Thrift HTTP server on a random port through the command-line interface and talk to it from client side.
